title: Fortune Fair
description: Fortune Fair is a short story prequel to the debut romance novel Tall, Dark & Handsome.Fortune Fair is set in the UK in 1997. You will meet Nancy a seventeen-year-old college student who has just finished her first year of college. Nancy and her friend Mickie go to a fun fair and they meet the Mysterious Madame Marigold. Whose destiny is Madame Marigold foreseeing, will it come true or is it just a cliche?
author: Ellie Rose Hawkins
